front.title: An approach to enable directory transactions

abstract.t: The directory is becoming an important part of the organization. As thedata in the directory becomes more critical, it needs to be consistent.With more applications storing information in the directory, there is aneed for transaction (atomic commit/rollback) services to be offered bythe directory to ensure consistency. This document describes amechanism to implement transaction service in a distributed replicateddirectory. It also describes the LDAP APIs that can be used to providea standard interface for the transaction service.
